message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, though. I'll sell it to you for $105. It's a fair price, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to give me a slight discount, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'll meet you halfway between $105 and $90. I'll sell it to you for $97.50. It's a fair price, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $85?

I understand you're really trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'll give you one more chance to meet me in the middle. I'll sell it to you for $92.50. It's a fair price, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to give me one more chance, but I'm really at my limit. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $80?
